name: Kahlua® Brie
author: Laine's Cheesecakes
summary: A sweet and savory easy appetizer. Delicious with slices of apples or with crackers! If you wish, cut the rind off top of the Brie.
ingredients: ¼ cup coffee-flavored liqueur (such as Kahlua®)
directions: Spread pecans onto a microwave-safe plate; heat in microwave, stirring every 2 minutes, until pecans are fragrant and lightly toasted, 4 to 6 minutes
Place Brie cheese on a microwave-safe plate
Stir pecans, coffee-flavored liqueur, and brown sugar together in a bowl; spread on top of Brie cheese
Heat Brie cheese mixture in the microwave until softened, 1 1/2 to 2 minutes
